Open Beta

iWallic wallet important announcement:


Due to the updated version of NEO 3.0, we decided to maintain and upgrade the server in order to better adapt it. It is expected to be completed within two days. During the maintenance upgrade, the asset page will not be displayed, and the transfer will be invalid. Please use it carefully or wait for the upgrade to be used.


If you want to view the assets, you can temporarily use the address in the NEO blockchain browser (address: http://state.otcgo.cn/?idx=0). In addition, the iWallic wallet only shows the details of the blockchain transaction. All transactions are completed by the blockchain, so there is no loss of assets on the wallet. Please don't worry. If you have any questions during the use, you can use the customer service micro signal: EXChain001!


The latest fix will be announced in the community as soon as possible.


May 5, 2019
